ygData.subject: Re: About Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: you will do fine in Unrest.  Just be sure to stay along the walls and run away when you see a train coming.  Tormented Dead and death beetles will do you
ygData.messageBody:
you will do fine in Unrest. Just be sure to stay along the walls and run
away when you see a train coming. Tormented Dead and death beetles will do
you fine...also Gtr Skeletons and dark boned skeletons.

- Ziffnab

-----Original Message-----
From: Don Bickner [mailto:bick@...]
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 5:26 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] About Unrest


Hello fellow Wizards,
I recently hit level 12 and am currently traveling with a group in and
around Daggnors Cauldron. If we are hunting Goblin Mariners or shamans,my
spells will hit, however if we bring in a Bosun,my spells are completely
resisted. Some in the group are getting tired of these and want to go into
Unrest. Will I be able to damage any MOBS there? The group consists of a 13
Ranger,14 Cleric,Myself 12 Wizard and a 16 Paladin (I know, the exp gap is
large and I get minimal exp, but heck...these are friends). Can anyone give
any pointers about what lie ahead in Unrest for our group. Oh By the
Way.....the NPC's at the Camp along the coast do NOT Always help protect
you...We all learned that the hard way against a Tidal Lord!

Thanks for any help,
Kueken Mith Marr
